title: Understanding Worksheet Structure
text: A worksheet in spreadsheet software like Excel or Google Sheets is a single page or sheet within a workbook. It can contain various elements such as tables, charts, and text.

title: Multiple Tables in a Worksheet
text: Consider whether a worksheet can accommodate more than one table and what conditions might apply if it can.

title: Can You Enter More Than One Table Per Worksheet?
text: Think about the layout and structure of a worksheet. Is there a restriction on the number of tables you can have?
choices: yes, only if you maintain at least one blank row between them
